Reason: The 'concurrent_writes' configuration is performance-sensitive. The configuration involves the creation of a Striped lock based on the value of 'DatabaseDescriptor.getConcurrentWriters()', which directly impacts the concurrency level of the system. The locking mechanism used in these methods can potentially cause bottlenecks and affect overall system performance, making the 'concurrent_writes' configuration performance-sensitive.
